name: test_e2e_with_logs[041_SQLI_BOOL_010]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_010` |
| **Name** | Simple UNION injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' UNION SELECT 1 --`
- **Encoded**: `'%20UNION%20SELECT%201%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~55000ms
- **Timestamp**: 20:31:15.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Advanced SQL Injection Attempt test_id=SQLI_BOOL_010-1770841875872-47iixg pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_010 uri=/?q='%20UNION%20SELECT%201%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |

## Detection Evidence
